description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr34736 [Piyo]`s sports comedy manga Teekyuu, serialised in Comic Earth Star.
Four girls make up Kameido High School`s Tennis Club, but they do not actually get in much tennis practice; first-year http://anidb.net/ch47680 [Oshimoto Yuri] and second-years http://anidb.net/ch47681 [Shinjou Kanae], http://anidb.net/ch47682 [Takamiya Nasuno], and http://anidb.net/ch47679 [Bandou Marimo] have all long been more likely to get into all sorts of situations, and their daily-life adventures continue. For example, an alien named Tomarin brings Marimo lunch and is shown around the school; on a visit to the public aquarium Marimo is all set to go fishing with her trident; http://anidb.net/ch57487 [Kondou] of the school paper tests the truth of an urban legend on Yuri; Kanae drags Yuri along for some meteor-shower viewing; the girls spend a tumultuous day at the beach; only to end up adrift somewhere on the ocean; Kondou`s older sister shows up and together with Yuri they manage to take a paranormal photo; Kanae and her mother visit grandmother who lives in the African desert...
— written by foo2
Note: The Japanese broadcast separates Teekyuu into 12 episode long seasons, even when they air as a single block. Therefore, this entry covers the fourth through seventh Japanese seasons.

REGULAR.description:
When Marimo forgets her lunch at home, her freeloading alien roommate Tomarin comes to deliver it. The girls decide to show Tomarin around Kameido High School, but for some reason school`s a little unusual that day...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とメン・イン・ブラック

REGULAR.description:
For some reason Kanae receives aquarium tickets from a man riding an elephant. The girls decide to go together, but the situation at the aquarium becomes increasingly inappropriate...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とロミオ・マスト・ダイ

REGULAR.description:
Kondo-san of the school paper asks Yuri for help with investigating the legend of the cherry tree growing in the school yard. Apparently something strange happens to those who receive romantic confessions underneath the tree.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とトレインスポッティング

REGULAR.description:
Kanae and Yuri discuss watching the meteor show said to appear that night. They plan to gether on the roof of Nasuno`s house, but... Will they be able to see the meteor shower?
Source: crunchyroll

The swimsuit episode is finally here! Everyone is brimming with excitement as they enjoy the beach in a variety of ways, but...
Source: crunchyroll

Yuri panics as the previous episode requires a sequel. Though the girls end up adrift at sea, Yuri wonders if the relaxed upperclassmen truly are just brave.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とキャスト・アウェイ

REGULAR.description:
Yuri is shown paranormal photos at Udonko`s shop. She tries to welcome home Udonko`s older sister and is shocked to learn she`s the ghost she once met at a funeral.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enemy at the Gates with Senpai
先輩とスターリングラード

REGULAR.description:
Kanae travels to her grandmother`s home in the middle of the Egyptian desert to visit her grandfather`s grave. It seems her extraordinary behavior comes from her grandmother.
Source: crunchyroll

Yota practices to prepare for a practice soccer match. Nasuno offers to be his training partner, but she makes a ridiculous suggestion to help him win the game.
Source: crunchyroll

Marimo and Tomarin walk through town in the blazing heat. Inside an air-conditioned electronics store, Marimo begins explaining human electronics to Tomarin, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senpai to Shaun of the Dead
Shaun of the Dead with Senpai
先輩とショーン・オブ・ザ・デッド

REGULAR.description:
The girls are hanging out at a candy store in the middle of summer vacation. When Kanae suggests they do something special for summer vacation, they begin throwing around ideas.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とバグズ・ライフ

REGULAR.description:
Nasuno and Marimo have tea at a cafe. When Nasuno says she wants to work a part-time job to learn more about society, Marimo begins passionately offering advice based on her one day of work at a pork bowl restaurant!
Source: crunchyroll

The girls win tickets to a certain place is a shopping mall lottery. Their destination is overseas, and they begin preparing for their trip, but...
Source: crunchyroll

The girls arrive in Cambodia. They go on a conventional sightseeing tour, visiting ruins and more ruins in a tuk tuk.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とキリング・フィールド

REGULAR.description:
Today is the cultural festival! Yuri`s class is putting on a tuna dissection show. Yuri and Udonko begin crawling full speed ahead to check out the other class` attractions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とビューティフル・ドリーマー

REGULAR.description:
After losing an obstacle course race in a sports festival long past, the tennis club is assigned to pick up garbage in the school`s courtyard. Marimo comments on how ironic it is that society`s garbage should have to pick up garbage, when...
Source: crunchyroll

The girls decide to hold a takoyaki party to celebrate fall. When they realize they have none of the necessary ingredients, they go to the store to buy some.
Source: crunchyroll

Udonko decides to do a story on the mysterious alien Tomarin. The jokes fly during the interview due to their surprisingly good chemistry.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とエイリアンVSプレデター

REGULAR.description:
Kanae suddenly enters the classroom while spitting blood. Shocked and dismayed, Marimo cannot contain her anger when she sees her hurt friend. In her quest to avenger her friend, she becomes a goddess of revenge...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とレザボア・ドッグス

REGULAR.description:
Kanae suddenly enters the classroom while spitting blood. The lead-in is the same until this point, but don`t let that bother you. The girls decide to scout out a rival school, but...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とミッション: インポッシブル

REGULAR.description:
The girls decide to roast potatoes. A certain fellow probably knows the most about sweets, but that aside, things don`t generally go well for the girls as they can`t find kindling and fail to start a fire properly...
Source: crunchyroll

Seasons turn, and winter arrives. As Yuri walks through town in the brisk air, with a sidelong glance to Marimo slipping across frozen puddles, she spots Kanae wearing a mask for once.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Day After Tomorrow with Senpai
先輩とデイ・アフター・トゥモロー

REGULAR.description:
This mallet and mortar have been passed down for generations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とソーシャル・ネットワーク

REGULAR.description:
My grandma`s in the hospital for Tommy John surgery.
Source: crunchyroll

The upperclassmen of the Tennis Club have PE class outside on a cold day. After warming up with exercise moves of their own creation, they take on the high jump.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とバックドラフト

REGULAR.description:
Kanae needs a new phone, but the clerk at the store keeps offering her products that are definitely not phones. Will Kanae and Yuri leave the store with a phone that can actually make calls?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とゴールデンアイ

REGULAR.description:
With Valentine`s Day just around the corner, Udonko and Yuri decide to make chocolate. However, it seems Udonko is very confused about what Valentine`s Day and even chocolate are supposed to be.
Source: crunchyroll

The cherry blossoms are blooming, and the girls decide to go flower watching. When they arrive at the park, Yuri notices they`ve brought a few friends with them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とプレミアム・ラッシュ

REGULAR.description:
The earth moves...
Source: crunchyroll

Udonko begs Yuri and Kanae for help with her family`s udon business. They agree to help make udon at the shop and are taught the ins and outs of udon by a very special teacher.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とボウリング・フォー・コロンバイン

REGULAR.description:
When Mika tears her ACL, Bobby asks the girls to take her place in his annual hero show. Yuri is unsure, but the other members enthusiastically agree to do it.
Source: crunchyroll

Once upon a time, there was a girl named Cinderella who wanted nothing more than to attend the party at the castle. However, with 245 evil sisters intead of two, will she be able to attend the party and meet her prince?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩と魔法にかけられて

REGULAR.description:
The girls decide to form a band to get more out of their youth. However, the discussion quickly reaches an unusually serious level with tons of realistic terminology thrown around.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とミート・ザ・ペアレンツ

REGULAR.description:
The team`s annual "Practice Super Seriously Day" has arrived. While the girls do indeed practice something that resembles tennis, it`s still a far cry from "serious practice."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とウィンブルドン

REGULAR.description:
Marimo runs into Udonko, who is on her way to look for an unidentified flying object that crashed into a nearby park. While searching for the UFO, they meet up with Tomarin and Tanaka-san, who points them in the direction of some peculiar "playground equipment."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Planet of the Apes with Senpai

REGULAR.description:
Marimo and her friends are trapped on an alien planet when their spaceship breaks down. While searching for the rubber band they need to repair their ship`s engine, they come across a strange domed structure. When they open the door, they find a shocking surprise waiting for them.
Source: crunchyroll

Right off the bat, Kanae-senpai is slurping cup noodles at the bottom of a giant hole. In the heavily accented speech of a pioneer, she invites Yuri to climb down into the hole and help her dig...? The long-awaited seventh season has begun! We look forward to another great year of Tekyu!
Source: crunchyroll

Kanae`s grandmother moves back to Japan from Egypt for no reason. Yuri is invited to help pick fruit. Grandma, fruit, help pick. Okay?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とアイアンクラッド

REGULAR.description:
"Summer vacation is almost over," Kanae remarks during the introduction. Yuri snaps back precisely, "This anime`s seasons are totally random." And that anime, Tekyu, is about to start again! Yahoooo!!!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とブロークバック・マウンテン

REGULAR.description:
When Yuri and Marimo realize they`re gaining weight, they decide to go on a diet. The naturally slim Kanae offers to coach them, but her advice is shaky at best. Will the girls be able to lose weight?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とデンジャラス・ビューティー

REGULAR.description:
Kanae and Marimo are hanging out at the park on a cold day. When a bear happens to wander by, they decide to question him about his hibernation habits, but the bear has some shocking answers for them.
Source: crunchyroll

One day at school, Yuri suddenly hears Udonko`s voice in her mind. Using her newfound telepathic powers, Udonko suggests they go bowling. With the rest of the Tennis Club in tow, Udonko leads them to the bowling alley which turns out to be located somewhere familiar to the group.
Source: crunchyroll

When Kanae complains about the cafeteria`s food, the new lunch lady challenges her to a school food showdown. Kanae accepts, but on the day of the event, she is sitting at the commentator`s table, while participating in her place is an all too familiar face.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel with Senpai
先輩とグランド・ブダペスト・ホテル

REGULAR.description:
When Yuri doesn`t come to school one day, the third years ask Udonko where she is. When they learn she`s home sick with a cold, they arrange a trip to visit her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とベティ・サイズモア

REGULAR.description:
When Yuri runs into Annenkov, she gets dragged into a mixer with Annenkov and her friends. However, no one would have expected the kind of men who show up and the disaster that befalls her in the bathroom.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuri is shocked when the seniors of the tennis club suggest they practice with the tennis club of Usakame High, their rival school`s team. Though their announcement initially brings tears of joys to her eyes, they`re quickly replaced by her regular irritation when she realizes just how similar the two teams are.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senpai to Kirishima, Bukatsu Yamerutte yo
先輩と桐島, 部活やめるってよ

REGULAR.description:
The tennis club is going camping! With baseball equipment, gold-plated RV, and not a single member with a driver`s license, the girls are ready to go.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とストレイト・ストーリー

REGULAR.description:
Kanae comes up with a brilliant new way for the girls to practice. Will their new practice methods enable them to finally compete in and win the national tournament?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 先輩とプライベート・ライアン
Back to the Future with Senpai
Senpai to Back to the Future
先輩とバック・トゥ・ザ・フューチャー
先輩とミスティック・リバー
Jingle All the Way with Senpai
Senpai to Jingle All the Way
先輩とジングル・オール・ザ・ウェイ
先輩とパシフィック・リム
先輩とチャイルド・プレイ
先輩とノース・ウォーリアーズ
